function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Documentation of the harmonisation process, training for data harmonisation, and implementation of international standards and protocols.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of automated data harmonisation pipelines, adoption of advanced statistical methods, and investment in data harmonisation infrastructure.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of appropriate statistical methods, rigorous data validation processes, and consideration of population diversity in data harmonisation.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing robust data sharing infrastructures, implementing standardized protocols, and increasing accountability","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Providing interdisciplinary training, enhancing digital literacy, and improving technical skills of health care professionals","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing regulatory frameworks that facilitate data sharing","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishing streamlined processes and communication channels with regulatory bodies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing incentives and streamlined processes for hospital participation","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establishing clear guidelines and legal interpretations for gdpr compliance","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict data security measures, ethical guidelines, and data access controls","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of common standards for data encoding and sharing, implementation of data integration and harmonization tools","category":"Infection tracking / control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in building neighborhood social capital, improving access to healthcare and information, and addressing environmental triggers.","category":"Raising
